name: Die by the Sword
description:
Die by the Sword is an action game developed by Treyarch Invention. It came out on 01-03-1998. Interplay Productions published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Die by the Sword on PC.
It was produced by Christopher A. Busse, Mark Nau and Peter T. Akemann. Don Likeness and Peter T. Akemann directed the game.
